Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-25646 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.55-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-25646 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.55-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpng is earlier than 1.6.55-1, affected by CVE-2026-25646
